idea:

“Working towards Government vision of ‘Make in India’ and ‘Atmanirbhar Bharat”

“We convert Waste into Wealth”
name: RUNAYA REFINING LLP

idea:
The Clownfish is an enhanced brand that endorses premium quality designed bags that are known for endurance, durability, and elegance. We have an exclusive top-rated collection of bags that compliment every mood of our customers, ranging from briefcases, messenger bags, backpacks, duffels and many more.

The Clownfish understands the needs of the modern consumer and on that basis, it designs its product which is adherent to style, color, mood as well as quality. Presently, The Clownfish has 500 plus products in its house which are designed efficiently from leather, leatherette, polyester, canvas, nylon, etc. Thus offering a wide number of choices to the customers. We at The Clownfish prioritize our customers and deliver the best service we can and ensure maximum satisfaction.
name: GREEN APPLE VENTURE LLP

idea:
M/s. Ajay Plates & Battery Products an MSME Unit established in District

Palghar of Maharshtra came in to existence in 1994 with latest

manufacturing and testing equipment’s manufacturing Lead Acid Batteries

uder Brand ‘DINESH’ for various applications. An ISO 9001-2008

Registered firm we are also registered with N.S.I.C and DGS&D under

Single Point Registration and Catering to Various Govt. Semi Government

and private Customers for their Various needs .

India Lead Acid Battery market is projected to reach $ 7.6 billion by 2023.

The battery which uses sponge lead and lead peroxide for the conversion

of the chemical energy into electrical power, such type of battery is called

a lead acid battery. They get it from the battery

Battery is an essential requirement to start electrically operating

equipment’s, especially in electrically operated vehicles. And also, in case

of mains failures or interruptions in power supply, a standby or backup

power is necessary for critical applications. Therefore a battery provides

the necessary power to starting as well as standby depending on the type

of application. We feel proud to say we generate employment in rural tribal

belt of Maharshtra with 100% recycled and recyclable raw material

producing High density batteries for the applications as automobiles,

railways, airlines, defense, telecommunication, power stations, industries,

and so on.

Empowerment – As we have set up our factory in rural tribal belt in District

Palghar Maharashtra we are empowering local tribal work force.

Protecting the Nature – Lead is a major raw material used in

manufacturing of Batteries it comprises 88% of overall raw material and

the rest 12% is Plastic used for Battery casing insulating, etc. Lead used in

“Dinesh” Batteries is 100 % recycled meeting international standards

providing maximum current output saving the mother nature from

environment hazard.

A Vision Called Made in India - We make sure the Balance of 12% raw

material (Plastic Component)(88% comprises of recycled Lead) used in

our Batteries are sourced from made in India manufacturer’s only with

100% raw-material indigenous we feel proud to say ‘Dinesh ‘ Batteries are

100% Made in India Product, saving our Nation’s Forex helping Build our

nation and making our P.M.O’s vision of made in India a success.

Our Moto- Committed towards SMILLING START.
name: Ajay Plates And Battery Products

idea: 65% of deaths due to accidents in India involve trucks. 80% of road accidents in India are due to controllable factors like sleep deprivation and bad driving practices. Apart from the massive loss of life, these accidents and deaths directly impact a mammoth 3% of India’s GDP. Creating our proprietary AI technology through real-time intervention in their local language we will help truck drivers make safer choices on the road, lower their chances of meeting with accidents, and connect this largely fragmented network to foster a sense of community and make them prosperous members of society.
name: Safer Driver

idea:
LivRite is an impact business that was founded to offer consumers REAL products that facilitate guilt free indulgence. Our first product range is pure, traceable, sustainable, responsibly sourced, HONEY ( natural, organic and spice infused ) with great social impact. We are ISO, HACCP, HALAL and Organic certified and operate in house on the farm to fork model which gives us an immense advantage in quality control. We have extended our range to offer honey based, specific wellness products like immunity boosters, sleep aid etc. We cater to the B2B, B2C, export, Gifting and HoReCa segments. 

In the world of fake naturals, Beelicious is an impact brand that offers real & natural honey. We address a consumer's actual need, which is to benefit from the consumption of honey.

Since every step from farm to fork is executed in-house; there is 100% quality control. This is v critical since Honey is the 3rd largest adulterated food in the world; and most people are unaware of what they are selling or consuming.
name: LIVRITE GLOBAL CREATIONS (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED
SARAL BHARAT QUICK SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
